review: So far I love my amazon fire.  It was easy to set up. The only thing that is a little tricky is using the universal remote.  It's a little touchy so I recommend setting it up with the best angle from wherever you are in the room.  There is a sensor that needs to sit in front of the cable box.
author: Kelsey Miller
